column1: who want to grow government impose additional taxes and start new wars.  Your votes have sent an important message to the Establishment. You want someone who will stand up to the Swamp. I have made that my mission in Congress. (2/2)

Thank you to the voters who have given me an opportunity to serve them another two years.  I will continue to be a champion for the Constitution life and the 2nd Amendment and continue to say “no” to those in Washington of both parties (1/2)
